Html:
Hello,

I am trying to create a dictation module.
I have seen different discussions but none gives an exact answer.

My problem is reposition a wave in stream. In my case i use a wavefilewriter with a memorystream.
Wavefilewriter does not support re positionning.

Any idea how to achieve this ?

Thanks in advance.
you can't reposition a wavein device as it is simply giving you audio from the soundcard. Are you trying to go back in a WAV file and overwrite something you already wrote?
